title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple Pythonic API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; chat with any local model, upload docs, manage prompts.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models, and stream responses in JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chat, generation, and model management in Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive model picker, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama server and bundling models in containers.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chat UI that streams responses from Ollama and stores threads in local IndexedDB.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that uses CodeLlama via Ollama for inline code generation and explanation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support and rate limiting.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight Node.js wrapper around Ollama REST API published on npm with TypeScript support.

title: ollama-py
summary: Community Python client on PyPI offering sync/async wrappers and Pydantic response models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that brings Ollama models into Discord servers with slash commands and conversation memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and generate text.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Community registry that converts Hugging Face models to Ollama Modelfiles and hosts them for one-pull install.
